This was a studio conversion that was done manually, frame by frame, overseen by Spielberg and took over one year to produce. Stunning 3D and excellent quality uploaded file here as well. Definitely worth the download.  
A 10
V 10

Why the fuck are people asking if it's a conversion (and why is ultra fucktard evrythgzen asking if it's from the 3D BR)?

THE MOVIE WAS MADE IN 1993.  IT'S A FUCKING CONVERSION.  THE BLURAY IS A FUCKING CONVERSION.

What?  Did you retards think Spielberg reshot the whole fucking movie in 3D?  That somehow he got the same fucking actors (some of whom are now DEAD), and got them to look the same fucking age they did 20 years ago (the children are all grown up now!)?

Christ.  Brainless fucks like you should have your Internet access taken away.  I hope your ISPs cut you off for downloading this movie.

It does not appear to be a quick and dirty conversion from the screenshots so I think I will get this. I loved watching it as a kid and it may be worth a re-watch in 3D. If it is just a "conversion", hopefully they did a better job than say I,Robot which had little depth and objects in the wrong place in 3D space (had to double check that someone didn't simply run it through automated 3D conversion software).

Why don't you guys listen to comments from someone who actually watched the movie? AGAIN, This was a studio conversion that was done manually, frame by frame, overseen by Spielberg and took over one year to produce. Stunning 3D and excellent quality uploaded file here as well. Definitely worth the download.
A 10
V 10
(Watched on a Sharp 80" 3D LCD)
